node.title: Woman smiles in mugshot after allegedly slaying boyfriend with sword on Christmas Eve
node.description: The couple had been taking meth earlier in the day.
node.content: ["A US woman has been arrested after she allegedly killed her boyfriend with a sword on Christmas Eve.", "Missouri woman Brittany Wilson, 32, smiled as her mugshot was taken after she was taken into custody.", "Police found the body of Wilson's boyfriend Harrison Stephen Foster, 34, in the basement of his home after responding to a report of \"suspicious activity\".", "Wilson was found outside the home covered in blood. She allegedly told police she killed him with a sword after they took meth together earlier that today, local TV station KFVS reports.", "Foster was stabbed three times and pronounced dead at the scene, police say.", "Wilson allegedly told police Foster had been harvesting body parts and had \"several other entities living inside his body for the past several months\".", "Police said Wilson claimed that by stabbing him, she was \"setting him free\".", "Wilson was arrested on a charge of first-degree murder."]
